description.narrative: The aim of this project is to establish a pre-positioned NGO-managed pooled fund for Bangladesh Start Fund Bangladesh to enable NGOs to access rapid funding to respond to the country’s under-funded small to medium sized crises

mailing-address.narrative: 1 Saint Johns Lane, London EC1M 4AR, United Kingdom
